job.description:
This Jobot Job is hosted by Tori Bender

Our client is changing the world through the development of ocean-based vehicles. They are transforming the way ocean data is collected and distributed worldwide, allowing scientists, engineers, and governments access to insights that were previously unobtainable.
You’ll be a part of a team taking on earth’s last frontier!
